T. Rashid

dcterms:description: The StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) is an experimental platform based on the popular real-time strategy game StarCraft II, designed for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms in decentralized micromanagement tasks.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:creator: F. A. Oliehoek
C. Amato
dcterms:description: Dec-POMDP is a framework for modeling fully cooperative multi-agent tasks where agents share a common reward function and have partial observations of the environment.
dcterms:title: Dec-POMDP

dcterms:description: Various scenarios in StarCraft II, such as 2s3z, 3s5z, and 1c3s5z, are used to evaluate the performance of multi-agent algorithms in different difficulty levels.
dcterms:title: Various scenarios in StarCraft II
